translation: In front of Bhishma and Drona, and all the rulers of the earth, he said: "O Arjuna, son of Pritha, behold these Kurus gathered together."
commentary: 1.25 Bhishma and Drona in front of Bhishma and Drona? of all of all? f and? mahikshitam rulers of the earth? said said? Partha O Partha? See behold? Ethan these? gathered together? Kurun Kurus? is thus.No Commentary.
